monster.name: Clockwork Behir

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The behir makes two attacks: one with its bite and one to constrict.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller creature. 17 (2d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 16) if the behir isn't already constricting a creature, and the target is restrained until this grapple ends.

action.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The behir exhales a line of lightning that is 20 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 (12d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Swallow
text: The behir makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the behir, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the behir's turns. A behir can have only one creature swallowed at a time.

If the behir takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the behir must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls prone in a space within 10 feet of the behir. If the behir dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

monster.description: Source: The Orrery of the Wanderer p. 173

monster.name: Dagdra Deepforge

trait.name: Divine Eminence
trait.text: As a bonus action, Dagdra can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Dagdra expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
trait.text: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: Dagdra is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Dagdra has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, guiding bolt, sanctuary
• 2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, spiritual weapon
• 3rd level (2 slots): dispel magic, spirit guardians

action.name: Mace
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Scroll Service (1/Day)
action.text: As an action, Dagdra draws a spell scroll from her documancy satchel. The scroll contains a spell of up to 3rd level of Dagdra's choice. Only Dagdra can use the scroll, which vanishes after 1 minute.

monster.spells: light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy, cure wounds, guiding bolt, sanctuary, lesser restoration, spiritual weapon, dispel magic, spirit guardians
monster.description: Source: The Orrery of the Wanderer p. 145

monster.name: Devil Dog

action.name: Club
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: Devil Dog is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). Devil Dog has following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (3 slots): bless, cure wounds, sanctuary

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: <$title_short_name$>'s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 10). <$title_short_name$> can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: thaumaturgy
1/day each: darkness, hellish rebuke

monster.spells: light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy, bless, cure wounds, sanctuary, thaumaturgy, darkness, hellish rebuke
monster.description: Source: The Orrery of the Wanderer p. 85

monster.name: Enormous Tentacle

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, and the tentacle can't constrict another target.

monster.description: Source: The Orrery of the Wanderer p. 94

monster.name: Gildha Duhn

trait.name: Relentless Endurance
trait.text: When reduced to 0 hit points, <$title_short_name$> drops to 1 hit point instead (but can't do this again until they finish a long rest).

trait.name: Savage Attacks
trait.text: When they score a critical hit, <$title_short_name$> can roll one of the weapon's damage dice and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: Gildha is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). Gildha has following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (3 slots): bless, cure wounds, sanctuary

action.name: Club
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

monster.spells: light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy, bless, cure wounds, sanctuary
monster.description: Source: The Orrery of the Wanderer p. 110

monster.name: Grunka

trait.name: Martial Advantage
trait.text: Once per turn, Grunka can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of Grunka that isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Acid Spray Gun (Recharge 5-6)
text: The hobgoblin sprays acid in a 10-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The spray gun has a tank that can be filled with ten standard vials of acid mixed with water, allowing it to be used five times.

monster.description: Source: The Orrery of the Wanderer p. 115

monster.name: Jelayne
monster.languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

monster.description: Source: The Orrery of the Wanderer p. 84

monster.name: Mechachimera

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The chimera makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its horns, and one with its claws. When its fire breath is available, it can use the breath in place of its bite or horns.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Horns
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon head exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.description: Source: The Orrery of the Wanderer p. 134

monster.name: Onyx

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Relative Size
trait.text: Any damage Onyx would take is reduced to 0. She has advantage on ability checks and saving throws.

trait.name: Dealing with Onyx
trait.text: Onyx cannot be overcome or killed by combat. Any weapon attack against her that hits AC 12 makes contact but deals no lasting damage. However, if the attack would deal 10 or more damage, Onyx has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of her next turn. If Onyx would take 10 or more damage from spells or other effects, it yields the same result. Spells that impose conditions function normally against Onyx, but those conditions end automatically at the end of the cat's next turn.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 11 (2d10) slashing damage.

monster.description:
Onyx cannot be overcome or killed by combat. Any weapon attack against her that hits AC 12 makes contact but deals no lasting damage. However, if the attack would deal 10 or more damage, Onyx has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of her next turn. If Onyx would take 10 or more damage from spells or other effects, it yields the same result. Spells that impose conditions function normally against Onyx, but those conditions end automatically at the end of the cats next turn.
Source: The Orrery of the Wanderer p. 186

monster.name: Replica Duodrone

trait.name: Axiomatic Mind
trait.text: The duodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Dismantlable
trait.text: If the replica duodrone dies, its body falls into a pile of parts (gears, plates, screws, and wires), leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The duodrone makes two fist attacks or two javelin attacks.

action.name: Fist
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Javelin
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Variant: Rogue Modrons
text: A modron unit sometimes becomes defective, either through natural decay or exposure to chaotic forces. Rogue modrons don't act in accordance with Primus's wishes and directives, breaking laws, disobeying orders, and even engaging in violence. Other modrons hunt down such rogues.
A rogue modron loses the Axiomatic Mind trait and can have any alignment other than lawful neutral. Otherwise, it has the same statistics as a regular modron of its rank.

monster.description: Source: The Orrery of the Wanderer p. 132

monster.name: Replica Monodrone

trait.name: Axiomatic Mind
trait.text: The monodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Dismantlable
trait.text: If the replica monodrone dies, its body falls into a pile of parts (gears, plates, screws, and wires), leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Javelin
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

action.name: Variant: Rogue Modrons
text: A modron unit sometimes becomes defective, either through natural decay or exposure to chaotic forces. Rogue modrons don't act in accordance with Primus's wishes and directives, breaking laws, disobeying orders, and even engaging in violence. Other modrons hunt down such rogues.
A rogue modron loses the Axiomatic Mind trait and can have any alignment other than lawful neutral. Otherwise, it has the same statistics as a regular modron of its rank.

monster.name: Replica Pentadrone

trait.name: Axiomatic Mind
trait.text: The pentadrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Dismantlable
trait.text: If the replica pentadrone dies, its body falls into a pile of parts (gears, plates, screws, and wires), leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The pentadrone makes five arm attacks.

action.name: Arm
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Paralysis Gas (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The pentadrone exhales a 30-foot cone of gas. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Variant: Rogue Modrons
text: A modron unit sometimes becomes defective, either through natural decay or exposure to chaotic forces. Rogue modrons don't act in accordance with Primus's wishes and directives, breaking laws, disobeying orders, and even engaging in violence. Other modrons hunt down such rogues.
A rogue modron loses the Axiomatic Mind trait and can have any alignment other than lawful neutral. Otherwise, it has the same statistics as a regular modron of its rank.

monster.description: Source: The Orrery of the Wanderer p. 132

trait.name: Dismantlable

action.text: The quadrone makes two fist attacks or four shortbow attacks.

monster.name: Stomping Foot

trait.name: Turn Immunity
trait.text: The foot is immune to effects that turn undead.

action.name: foot
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning or slashing damage (foot's choice).

monster.description: Source: The Orrery of the Wanderer p. 92

monster.name: Two Dry Cloaks
monster.skill: Deception +5, Insight +4, Investigation +5, Perception +6, Persuasion +5, Sleight of hand +4, Stealth +4

trait.name: Cunning Action
trait.text: On each of its turns, Two Dry Cloaks can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
trait.text: Two Dry Cloaks deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Two Dry Cloaks that isn't incapacitated and Two Dry Cloaks doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Feline Agility
trait.text: When <$title_short_name$> moves on its turn in combat, they can double their speed until the end of the turn. Once they uses this ability, <$title_short_name$> can't use it again until they moves 0 feet on one of their turns.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Two Dry Cloaks makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: ++2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) slashing damage.

monster.description: Source: The Orrery of the Wanderer p. 162

monster.name: Undead Cockatrice

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw against being magically petrified. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is restrained. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified for 24 hours.

monster.description: Source: The Orrery of the Wanderer p. 114
